product_name: IT CosmeticsBye Bye Pores Translucent Loose Setting Powder
summary: SummaryIT Cosmetics Bye Bye Pores Translucent Loose Setting Powder minimizes the look of pores and imperfections for an airbrushed, flawless makeup look. Ideal for oily skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsA loose powder that instantly minimizes the look of large pores and imperfections for an airbrushed finishDeveloped with plastic surgeons, this pore-minimizing setting powder is great for all skin types and ideal for oily skinBest-selling, award-winning translucent powder creates the look of smooth skin for a flawless lookInstantly minimizes the look of large pores and skin imperfectionsActs as a finishing powder and makeup setting powder to set face makeup, including foundation and concealerUniversal translucent shade works on all skin tonesDelivers a natural, matte finish that lasts!Key IngredientsSilkHydrolyzed CollagenAntioxidantsPeptidesItem 2264078How To UseSweep a small amount of loose translucent powder onto skin. Can be worn over makeup or on bare skin to minimize the appearance of large pores and create an airbrushed finish. Pairs perfectly with Love Beauty Fully Complexion Powder Brush #225.Beauty tips: Want to set your concealer? Use a fluffy eye shadow brush to apply Bye Bye Pores underneath the eye for controlled application.IngredientsSilica, Soluble Collagen, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Silk, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Niacinamide, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Algae Extract, Avena Sativa Kernel Extract, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Carbomer, Cholesteryl Chloride, Cholesteryl Nonanoate, Cholesteryl Oleyl Carbonate, Citric Acid, Glycerin, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea Leaf Extract, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Retinyl Palmitate, Rosa Canina Flower Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Sweep a small amount of loose translucent powder onto skin. Can be worn over makeup or on bare skin to minimize the appearance of large pores and create an airbrushed finish. Pairs perfectly with Love Beauty Fully Complexion Powder Brush #225.Beauty tips: Want to set your concealer? Use a fluffy eye shadow brush to apply Bye Bye Pores underneath the eye for controlled application.
ingredients: Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: This is the best setting powder ever!
reviews.comments: The color is just right for my skin. It takes away just enough.Shine to make your skin look radiant.

reviews.headline: Love this product.   One of my go to's.
reviews.comments: Wonderful product, blurs lines, I cannot live without.

reviews.headline: Ghostly.
reviews.comments: Works great but they need to come out with a few tinted formulas. I'm fish belly white and this makes even me look ghostly. Sadly I had to stop using it. If they came out with a tinted version I'd definitely buy it.

reviews.headline: I buy this product because of it's light weight feeling.
reviews.comments: It feels like silk.

reviews.headline: Calms the shine
reviews.comments: IT powder does calm the shine on my face. Just have to be careful not to use too much of it or it just highlights the smile lines on my face.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: Works great but small amount of powder for the price.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: Makeup artist here for over 30 years and I've tried all the high end setting powders for under eyes. This is THE BEST at setting concealer beautifully. Keeps my concealer & entire eye area crease free & perfect all day and I'm over 50!

reviews.headline: Best setting powder, bought for the 2nd time
reviews.comments:
I love this setting powder, & unpopular opinion, I think it's much better than Hourglass veil. I work the powder into a puff, tap it off lightly, and *press into* all areas of my face that I want to set. (Not using a brush). Including my undereyes — very lightly with above method — with what's left on puff after the rest of my face. I follow with setting spray (my fav of that is urban decay) and I feel like my makeup looks great. Shrug. I don't get creasing around my eyes this way. 
I like IT CC Nudeglow w/ this powder a lot- finally just tried the CC. Can't comment on flash back in photos. 
Hope they never stop making this!

reviews.headline: My go to setting powder.
reviews.comments: I've tried other setting powders, but this is the best I have tried. It sets so evenly and hides pores. I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Talc less powder
reviews.comments: It cosmetics bye bye pores loose powder airbrushes your face flawlessly and without color.  It is my favorite product they make!

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: I've been using this for so long. I will never use another setting powder.

reviews.headline: Overpriced/nothing special
reviews.comments: So chalky and has a white cast even on pale skin. Dossnt keep makeup set.

reviews.headline: Overpriced/nothing special
reviews.comments: So chalky and has a white cast even on pale skin. Dossnt keep makeup set.

reviews.headline: YES! I always buy this product and am never without it.!
reviews.comments: Love this..light and exactly what is needed without making. I am a long time user.

reviews.headline: It's in little things
reviews.comments: I use this on top of my finishing powder only on/around the t-zone for blackhead coverage. Makes just enough of a difference that it's worth it and now I can't go without.

reviews.headline: Pores Disappear
reviews.comments: I've been using this powder for a couple of years.  I've enjoyed the loose powder and the compact.  Both go on like silk.  And yes, pores seem to disappear.  It's a wonderful finishing step for any makeup regimen.  I'm 63 and people often compliment me on how great my skin looks.  I truly believe it's this powder that gives my face that smooth appearance.

reviews.headline: A nice light loose powder
reviews.comments: I HATE a shiny or dewy look, it just doesn't compliment my mature skin.  This product allows me to achieve a very light coverage and no shine thru the day.  I'm not one of thos gals who checks her makeup every hour and does touch ups thru the day... once in the morning and done until my workdays over.  If I'm planning to go out later I'll simply wash my face and do a fresh application as opposed to caking more on. That said I don't see this to be the powder to use if you like the baking option when apply your makeup, it will look cakey with a white powdery cast.  The one con I'd say is price, it is waaay overpriced for the small amount of product you receive.  It really shouldn't cost more than $20.

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments: Love this for insuring oily skin stays away. Used another brand and didn't do the job. Switched back and glad I did.

reviews.headline: not worth it
reviews.comments: really bad white cast that looked WHITE and powdery all day, even after setting spray. also this container is more expensive and smaller than it used to be. I returned and bought the Laura Mercier.

reviews.headline: Impressed
reviews.comments: I'm loving It cosmetics. I love the coverage to control the oil my makeup last all day. I just wish it has a hint of color on it.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using this powder in my kit for over a year and IT IS PERFECTION. As a professional working makeup artist, based in Miami (where its hot and humid 24/7), it is honestly the only powder that with-stands the humidity and keeps you looking completely airbrushed, hence the title. It has no bounce-back, blurs out your pores and lasts all day. I always apply it with a brush, I don't really use the little powder pouf it comes with but I keep it inside to keep the loose powder from spilling out. Its so sheer and lightweight enough to use around the eyes.. I use this on almost every single client of mine, no matter the skin tone. Its great to use to set your foundation and concealer or on bare skin to control shine and mattify. I've used and tried many other brands of loose powders/translucent powders and this one is honestly my favorite. I highly recommend this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Truly keeps you airbrushed!

faceoff_negative.comments: Unfortunately at 51 I am too old to perform Kabuki so I will be returning the white "no matter how delicately you apply and blend" face powder.  People would probably not notice my pores because they would be too busy trying to decide what I am dying from...This is a definet must have if that is the look you are going for...
faceoff_negative.headline: Perhaps dysentery?
